attributes.action: Take sanitary wear adverts off the tv
attributes.additional_details: To help us Ladys have some decency.
attributes.background: The tv adverts for ladys sanitary wear and bladder weakness wear are a personal and sensitive area for women. I would like a petition started to take them off tv for good.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Government and Parliament aren't responsible for deciding on the content of adverts.
